column4: bit of a hijack here... my /home is on a seperate mount point as well... when I do a clean install of edgy, could I just leave my /home partition unformatted and go with it, no dataloss?
correct, an advantage of doing it that way ;)
hmm... i'll be going from dapper to edgy though... should i be worried about prefs or the like 'hanging over' and causing problems?

I can't forsee any and all scenarios but it worked for me, I even have amd64 and 32bit systems I switch between without problem (with a bit more care than just a /home) but point is yes, you *should* be alright
